name: Lil' Stalingrad
description:
FOR THE MOTHERLAND! NOT ONE STEP BACK!

-This is my very first game. It is rough, I know.  This is mostly just me attempting to learn GameMaker. Hopefully, with the knowledge I acquired  from this long learning process, I can create more polished games in the future. Your feedback, good or bad, will help me a lot when it comes to improving my game development skills.

-Botz Games
